acronyms.FERPA: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act
acronyms.LCA: Lead Contact Assignment - system using Traction Complete to assign leads and contacts to appropriate owners
acronyms.DREAM: Salesforce, Marketing Cloud, and Five9 Development team
acronyms.CCAF: Community College of the Air Force
acronyms.BASW: Bachelor of Arts in Social Work
acronyms.FAFSA: Free Application for Federal Student Aid
acronyms.HIPAA: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

internal_terms.Refinement: AI-assisted work item grooming and preparation
internal_terms.Grooming: Process of refining and preparing work items for development
internal_terms.Solutioning: Phase where technical solution design is created
internal_terms.Finalization: Phase where artifacts are created and work item is completed
internal_terms.Well-Architected: Salesforce Well-Architected Framework pillars (Trusted, Easy, Adaptable)
internal_terms.Traceability: Mapping acceptance criteria to solution elements and telemetry
internal_terms.Test Data Matrix: Reusable test data variations for test cases
internal_terms.Individualized Care Segment: Business-defined custom segments used by LCA to assign students to specific care levels
internal_terms.FastTrack: Core Salesforce development team that works on core Salesforce tickets
internal_terms.Traction Complete: Third-party tool used for lead and contact assignment automation (https://tractioncomplete.com)
internal_terms.Bridge Program: Special courses for students not meeting English proficiency requirements (Asia)
internal_terms.ArmyIgnitED: Military partnership program for Army personnel
internal_terms.Time & Tuition Estimator: Web tool for Stateside students to estimate program cost and completion
internal_terms.Journey Pipeline: Salesforce record capturing student lifecycle touchpoints and stages
internal_terms.Residency Classification: Process determining in-state vs out-of-state tuition status
internal_terms.Fast Plan Request: Preliminary transfer credit evaluation request form for Europe
internal_terms.RollCall: GUILD website platform for retrieving lead files
internal_terms.Zeta: External contact center (formerly DoublePositive) for lead engagement
internal_terms.Abatement: In-house collections status for unpaid balances
internal_terms.Helio Campus: Data warehouse partner for reporting and analytics
internal_terms.Student Portal: Centralized access point for students to manage classes, finances, and academic progress
internal_terms.Checklist Items: Tasks and action items for students to complete (To Dos) in PeopleSoft/Student Portal
internal_terms.Hold: Overdue task preventing registration or other actions
internal_terms.OnBase: Document management system of record for UMGC
internal_terms.Parchment: Web service for receiving official transcripts
internal_terms.English Proficiency: Admission requirement for international students (TOEFL, IELTS)
internal_terms.Auto Matriculation: Process where students are automatically admitted and matriculated in PeopleSoft after eApp completion
internal_terms.Articulation: Process of translating transfer work into UMGC course equivalents
internal_terms.Degree Plan: Required plan for military students utilizing tuition benefits
internal_terms.CareerQuest: Platform for career services hosted on PeopleGrove
internal_terms.Handshake: App for job postings and employer connections
internal_terms.GetSet: App for student/alumni connections and peer support
internal_terms.Aloft: Virtual computer lab for Cybersecurity and Data Analytics
internal_terms.TogetherAll: Mental health support platform for students
internal_terms.Academic Liaison Project: Collaboration between Success Coaches, MECs, and Faculty to support struggling students
internal_terms.Faculty Evaluation Survey: End of course survey for student feedback
internal_terms.Graduation Services: Team responsible for reviewing program completion and conferring degrees
internal_terms.Commencement Services: Team responsible for planning and executing graduation ceremonies
internal_terms.Institutional Advancement: Department responsible for fundraising, alumni relations, and donor engagement
internal_terms.Paradigm: Vendor for diploma printing and distribution
internal_terms.Aventri: Event management platform used for commencement and other university events
internal_terms.Marching Order: Platform used for managing graduation ceremony registration and logistics
internal_terms.Ellucian Advance: System of record for USM Foundation alumni and donor data
internal_terms.Anthology: Fundraising and alumni engagement platform (formerly iModules)
internal_terms.Financial Edge: Financial management system used by USM Foundation
internal_terms.Workday: HR and finance system used by UMGC
internal_terms.Initium: Managed package for address validation and formatting in Salesforce
internal_terms.Qualtrics: Survey platform used for alumni feedback
internal_terms.Alumni Portal: Portal experience for alumni to access directory and resources
internal_terms.Alumni Continuing Enrollment: Campaign encouraging alumni to pursue further degrees
internal_terms.Alumni Returning Predictive Model: Scoring model predicting likelihood of alumni returning for another degree
internal_terms.Donor Predictive Model: Scoring model indicating likelihood to donate
internal_terms.My Volunteer Program: Initiative encouraging alumni to volunteer in various capacities
internal_terms.Grad Walk: In-person graduation event held in Maryland

Digital Platforms.description: Digital Platforms team responsible for Salesforce and CRM systems

DREAM.description: Salesforce, Marketing Cloud, and Five9 Development team

Corporate Learning Solutions.description: Promotes interest through corporate and business partnerships

Degree Audit.description: Team responsible for preliminary and official transcript evaluations

Residency Classification.description: Department responsible for reviewing and determining student residency status

Tuition Planning.description: Supports students in formulating funding plans (Financial Aid, TA, VA, etc.)

Financial Aid.description: Manages federal, state, and institutional aid funds

Student Accounts.description: Manages payments, billing, and financial aid disbursements

Accessibility Services.description: Provides academic accommodations for students with disabilities

Academic Integrity.description: Handles student and faculty referrals regarding student conduct

Student Resolution.description: Investigates student inquiries related to conduct, ethics, and behaviors

Career Services.description: Provides lifetime career support to students and alumni

Graduation Services.description: Manages graduation applications, degree conferral, and diploma distribution

Commencement Services.description: Plans and executes commencement ceremonies and events

Institutional Advancement.description: Manages alumni relations, fundraising, and donor engagement

Alumni Relations.description: Sub-team within Institutional Advancement focused on alumni engagement

Advancement Services.description: Sub-team within Institutional Advancement managing donor data and gift processing

context_notes.usage: This dictionary provides context for understanding organizational terminology throughout the workflow
context_notes.update_frequency: As needed when new terms are introduced
context_notes.update_process: AI agent detects new terms during research, requests user approval, then updates dictionary if approved
